vision: create a mobile app called SuperSpouse, that allow couples to help and support each other in running a household or a family. System should allow a family member to basically start a family and invite family members to join, this will limit the visibility to who can access the family information. App should support offline use. App should make it easy to either log or request assistance with common household chores. Create an initial list of common household chores
scope: Create requirements for becoming a member, creating a family, adding members, logging or requesting chores and assigning, allow for the management of their own custom chore list

requirements.text: User Registration: Users must be able to register with an email address, password, and profile name. Attributes include: Email, Password, Profile Name.
requirements.benefit: Ensures only verified users can join, reducing spam or unauthorized access.
requirements.value: Provides a safe environment for family interactions
requirements.useCase: A new user wants to create an account to join or form a family group.

requirements.text: Family Creation: After registration, users should be able to create a family group. Attributes include: Family Name, Family ID.
requirements.benefit: Allows families to maintain privacy and control over who can see family information.
requirements.value: Enhances user control over data visibility
requirements.useCase: A user wants to start a new family group to coordinate household tasks.

requirements.text: Invite Members: Family creator or admin can send invites to join the family group via email or in-app link.
requirements.benefit: Streamlines the process of adding family members, reducing manual entry errors.
requirements.useCase: A family member wants to add another member to the family group.

requirements.text: Chore Logging: Users should be able to log completed chores. Attributes include: Chore Name, Date, Assigned User, Status.
requirements.benefit: Provides a clear record of task completion, reducing disputes and oversight.
requirements.value: Encourages accountability and transparency within the family
requirements.useCase: A user wants to log that they have cleaned the kitchen.

requirements.text: Chore Request: Users should request assistance with chores. Attributes include: Chore Name, Requested By, Priority, Due Date.
requirements.benefit: Reduces the time spent coordinating tasks manually.
requirements.value: Enhances family teamwork and chore management
requirements.useCase: A user needs help with taking out the trash.

requirements.text: Custom Chore List: Users should be able to manage their own list of chores, adding, editing, or removing chores.
requirements.benefit: Allows personalization to fit the unique needs of each family.
requirements.useCase: A user wants to add 'water the plants' to the family chore list.

requirements.text: Offline Mode: The app should function in offline mode, syncing data when an internet connection is available.
requirements.benefit: Ensures continuous usability even in areas with poor internet connectivity.
requirements.value: Enhances user reliability and trust in the app
requirements.useCase: A user is at a cabin with no internet but still wants to log chores.

questions.text: How should the app handle user authentication for security?
What is the process for a user to leave or remove another member from a family group?
How should the app handle data when transitioning from offline to online mode?
What are the priority levels for chores and how are they managed?
